content: Craft a paragraph with every word starting with the letter "f".

Furtively, Fredrick frolicked fearlessly, flipping fabulous feathers. Fantastically, his ferocious feline friend followed, fur flying freely. Firmly fixated on forbidden fruits, Fredrick fancied feasting fully. However, fleeting fears fluttered, foreseeing fierce fowl fury. Thus, Fredrick feigned fascination with fascinating fungi, fraudulently foiling fate. Farther, fabulous forests flourished, their fragrance filteringFredrick's fantasies. Fondly, he forecasted future frolics, far from finicky"fmt
